event: Earliest human settlement in present-day Estonia after Ice Age retreat
Finno-Ugric peoples establish farming and fishing communities
Viking trade routes connect Estonia to Scandinavia and Eastern Europe
Danish forces conquer northern Estonia during crusades
German crusading orders gain control over most of Estonia
Tallinn joins the Hanseatic League as a major Baltic port
Estonia comes under Swedish rule after Livonian Order collapses
University of Tartu is founded under Swedish administration
Russia gains control after the Great Northern War
Baltic German elite dominates society under Russian rule
Estonia declares independence after World War I
Soviet occupation begins during World War II
Nazi occupation devastates Jewish and urban communities
Soviet rule is reimposed after World War II
Estonia restores independence with the collapse of the Soviet Union
Estonia joins the European Union and NATO
